entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
